name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Senior DevOps Engineer, I possess extensive experience in **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, **Terraform**, **Ansible**, and CI/CD automation with **GitLab CI** and **GitHub Actions**. My technical prowess includes deep familiarity with **AWS** and **Azure** cloud services, coupled with capabilities in **networking**, **security**, and **scripting** using **Python**, **Bash**, and **Go**. I have hands-on experience working with databases such as **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, **DynamoDB**, **Cassandra**, and **Redshift**. 
With over 8 years of full-stack development experience, I have successfully built high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors utilizing a range of technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. I excel in creating enterprise-grade platforms with integrated AI/ML capabilities, predictive analytics, intelligent automation, and real-time data processing. 
My solid foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and DevSecOps practices drives me to develop secure applications adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, I have expertise in developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, ensuring efficient machine learning model deployment in production.
